root.name: Sacred 3
root.description: OverviewSacred 3 is the third full game in the Sacred franchise and will continue its hack slash gameplay with a third person isometric overhead view. The game will heavily use cooperative play as a base of gameplay and is developed primarily for console users, letting the Playstation 3 be its lead platform. Keen Games, new developer to Sacred, will be trying to take the franchise in other directions in terms of active combat and quality assurance.PlotThe ruler of the Ashen Empire Lord Zane has begun to open gates to the Ancarian underworld after the sacred bond between the people of Ancaria and the Seraphim Guardians of the kingdom had been forgotten. Faced by this corruption is a group of heroes that will push back the forces of evil and take back the land of peace.
